column5: I cant disagree with trying to make a ski-doo more green, but shouldn't we really be more concerned about the billions of liters of Jet fuel burnt over our heads? Seems nobody talks about that...  Just sayin..  poor Santa has to breath that crap in..
Now we can focus on keeping them out of our lakes.
Nice......  "our lakes", my my, better put up your own fence then as I fly by at 100mph+ lol  never a fisherman has ever used a sled to go ice fishing, not once ever....
going green is not new. my sled is a green sled and has been since it was built in 1997.     see its green
Clasic. I said out, not on. I was referring to the snowmobiles, including those driven by fishermen, that end up in the lakes. Carry on.
